ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit and Grant (First Programmatic Financial Sector Development Policy Operation) to the Republic of Mozambique The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grants to the Republic of Mozambique (the Recipient) a Credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 8,100,000 and a Grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 8,100,000. The purpose of said credit and grant is to reinforce financial stability, increase access to finance by households and firms, and enhance the development of long-term financial markets. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit and a grant, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit and grant are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the program in support of which the proceeds of such credit and grant are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said program is designed to promote the economic development of the Recipient and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Mozambique. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said program merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said program for such assistance.
ï»¿Republic ofMozambique - 2 - First Programmatic Financial Sector Development Policy Operation COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by Governor for Mozambique Regional Vice President Africa Region Senior Vice President and Chief Economist Vice President Concessional Finance and Global Partnerships Dated at Washington, DC JUN 2 0 2014
